ja: チ、チチチ、チ！
en: Chirp, Cheep-Cheep-Cheep, Chirp!

ja: 高度を落として主人の視界に入るなり、かん高く鳴く青い鳥。
en: The moment the blue bird descended into its master's field of vision it made its high-pitched call.

ja: その報告を、少女は無表情で聞いている。
en: The girl listened expressionlessly to the report.

ja: 「……かまわないわ、予想通りよ。
en: "...No matter. Everything is going as  expected.

ja: 撃つ事、壊す事しか能がなくても、青子の魔力の使い方は並じゃないから。急造の使い魔じゃ、まだ相手にはならないでしょう」
en: Even if she only knows how to shoot and destroy, the way Aoko uses magical energy is extraordinary. Hastily-formed familiars are no match for her."

ja: チチチ、と羽をすくめる駒鳥。
en: The robin flapped its wings as it tweeted in response.

ja: 青子を<誉|ほ>める有珠を批難しているのか、
en: Perhaps it was criticizing Alice for complimenting Aoko.

ja: 有珠に誉められる青子に嫉妬しているのか。
en: Or perhaps it was jealous of Aoko for being complimented by Alice.

ja: 主人である有珠にも、いまいち読み取れない鳴き声である。
en: Alice could barely make sense of its chirping rant.

ja: 蒼崎青子は半人前の魔術師だ。
en: Aoko Aozaki was a novice mage.

ja: 二年前まで魔術とは無関係に育ってきた少女で、生まれた時から魔女として育った有珠とは素質も経験も違いすぎる。
en: Until just two years ago, she was someone who grew up with no background in magecraft. Compared to Alice, who was raised as a witch from birth, Aoko possessed far less talent and experience.

ja: 本来なら相手にすらしない次元。
en: Winning was an impossibility for Aoko.

ja: 魔術の腕を競うなら十回中十回、有珠に軍配があがるだろう。
en: In a contest of skills in magecraft, ten times out of ten, Alice would be declared the victor.

ja: けれど、こと戦い、殺し合いなら話は別だ。
en: However, a battle to the death was a different story.

ja: 久遠寺有珠は戦闘向きの魔術師ではなく、
en: Alice Kuonji was not a mage suited for battle.

ja: 蒼崎青子は戦いに特化した壊し屋である。
en: Aoko Aozaki, on the other hand, was built for it.

ja: 純粋な魔力勝負では青子の方が上だろう、と有珠は認めてさえいる。
en: In a contest that pitted magical energy against magical energy, even Alice would concede that Aoko had the upper hand.

ja: 青子は魔力の使い方が抜群に上手い。
en: Aoko's manipulation of magical energy was extraordinary.

ja: 魔術回路の規模は有珠より小さいが、回路の回転の速さ、その耐久構造、魔力の質、燃費の良さが並はずれている。
en: The scale of her Magic Circuits was smaller than that of Alice's, but their rotational speed, durability, and quality of magical energy produced, not to mention the efficiency, were otherworldly.

ja: それが蒼崎青子の特性だ。
en: That was Aoko Aozaki's hallmark.

ja: 高度な魔術式は凡百に落ちるが、
en: Though she had many failings when handling sophisticated formulae,

ja: 魔力を流動させるだけの単純な魔術式なら、わずか二年の実践で有珠を上回っている。
en: in just two years of practice Aoko had surpassed Alice in simple formulae that merely required an energy input.

ja: ……天才的なノリの良さと勘の良さ。
en: She also had genius-level instincts and adaptability.

ja: 彼女の魔術行使は強いのではなく、おそろしく“速い”のだ。
en: Though Aoko was not particularly proficient at executing magecraft, she was terrifyingly fast.

ja: 蒼崎の家になんて生まれなければ、天才的な射撃手として名を<馳|は>せたに違いない。
en: If she had been born outside the Aozaki clan, she would have doubtless risen to fame as a competitive sharpshooter.

ja: 「でも、残念ね」
en: "What a pity."

ja: 正面から撃ちあえば有珠に勝ち目はない。
en: In a straight shootout, Alice did not stand a chance.

ja: 否、そもそも魔弾などという原始的な魔術を、久遠寺有珠は習得していない。
en: Alice Kuonji had never bothered to learn primitive magecraft like magic bullets in the first place.

ja: 彼女は典型的な人形師。
en: She was the classic puppeteer.

ja: 戦闘はすべて、手足となる使い魔が行うことだ。
en: Her familiars would carry out all the particulars of battle as her arms and legs.

ja: 「……制限時間には気づいているわよね青子。
en: "Clock's ticking, Aoko.

ja: 魔力はいくらでも貸してあげるけど―――貴女の魔弾は、あと半刻で<値崩|ねくず>れするわ」
en: I'm happy to lend you all the magical energy you like, but after an hour, those bullets will be worthless."

ja: チチチ、と<頷|うなず>くようにさえずって飛び立つ駒鳥。
en: Chirping as if in agreement, the robin took flight.

ja: 遊園地が少女の支配下に<陥|おちい>ってからじき十分。
en: It had been nearly ten minutes since Alice had made the amusement park into her dominion.

ja: <緑|みどり>色の霧が何を生み出すものなのか。
en: To what would the green fog give birth next?

ja: 地上を走る青子たちも、そろそろ事の深刻さに気が付く頃だった。
en: Aoko and Soujuurou, still running about, would soon come to understand the gravity of their situation.
